casebody.data:
Belknap,

Dec., 1896. Evans v. Meredith Shook & Lumber Co. Jewell, Stone, Owen f Martin, for the plaintiff. Jewett $ Plummer, E. A. f C. B. Hibbard, Samuel W. Rollins, and Edward B. S. Sanborn, for the defendants.

Case, for injuries sustained.by the plaintiff while serving the defendants as a fireman. Subject to the plaintiff’s exception, the court ordered a nonsuit. The exceptions were overruled, upon the ground that there was no evidence tending to show that the plaintiff was ignorant of any fact material to his safety.

Parsons, J., did not sit.
